name: X8
summary: A digital cataclysm has forced a reboot of all contemporary shooters. Heroes from different FPS franchises find themselves crossing paths back to their common ancestor game engine. They will compete to restore their source worlds and each rebuild their path home.

name: X8: NEO-19 White DLC
summary: Blast the competition away in style with the NEO-19 White Pack!

name: X8: Fallen Angel DLC
summary: Descend upon the battlefield in blazing fury and infernal fire with the Fallen Angel Pack!

name: X8: Japan Only Version
summary:
The next generation in Hero Shooters!

Executing its directive to assemble worthy opponents, the rogue mod X8 has collected characters from across different game franchises. Players embody a variety of heroes and engage in 5v5 VR battles to restore a path back to their worlds.
